text: Good morning!  How are you today?
I'm starting to get my morning going. How about you>
Good so far!  Today I'm informing people about a charity called Save the Children.  Have you heard of them?
It sounds familiar, but I'm not sure.  It is a generic title.
They are a charity which promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries
That sounds like a good charity.  I'm guessing that it is all international, and not local?
It's international.  They help all over the world!
That is good.  I just know there are a lot of local children that need help.  How trustworthy are they?
They're very transparent with how they use their funding.  86% goes directly to their programs, 9% to fundraising, and the remaining 5% to management and general expenses
Those are good stats!
Every day, 16,000 children die before their 5th birthday, mostly from preventable causes.  The charity is trying to change that
That is awful!  Is it mostly hunger and disease?
Yes, mostly.  However some children pass due to violence and conflict in their countries.  1 in 80 children worldwide must flee their home in order to escape violence.
Children shouldn't have to suffer those kind of things.  They had nothing to do with the conflicts.
Exactly!  Knowing that, would you be willing to donate ANY portion of your earnings for this HIT to the charity to help these children in need?
I would.  Do you know what difference it would make per dollar?

Every dollar makes a huge difference!  Over 3/4 of it will go directly to helping the children.  The remainder will indirectly also go to helping them by fundraising and management.  Would you like to donate $1.00 of your earnings?
I think that sounds fair?  Do you get to donate as well?
I do!  Thank you so much!
Cool. I will give $1!
